name: unfinished_dumb_mess
description:
My Godot Wild Jam #53 entry.

Assemble your defense of walls and towers against wave of enemies.

This is my second game jam. I had plans to add more things so the jam theme would fit better but time ran out. Hopefully it fits in. I don't really know does the gameplay make any sense. It just kind of happened while testing and playing with all kinds of things. You can mute music from the Settings menu. Thanks for playing!

Controls:
Use mouse to move your sword
LMB to attack or place buildings
RMB to use special attack or sell buildings

Additional credits:

Used font: Montserrat (https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Montserrat)
Sound effects: https://sfxr.me/
